title: Gio Corsi's Xbox, Star Wars Show - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.15.19
description:
To get 10% off AND free shipping, go to http://brooklinen.com and use promo code games.

Get 20% off and free shipping with the code GAMES at http://manscaped.com.

Go to http://escapetheinvasion.com/kfgames for 20% off your first box!

Unemployed Gio Corsi comes to talk about his 25-year video game career, X019, and Star Wars games with Greg.

Time Stamps - 
00:07:54 - Housekeeping
Love, Sex, and Stuff tonight!
Major Nelson: 18! The original @Xbox turns eighteen years old today. :birthday::video_game: Happy birthday you big black beautiful box.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack, Zack Parsley, Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:09:23 - Xbox Highlights
00:27:18 - “Do you think other Japanese series will be willing to make the jump onto Xbox?” - ArkWing
00:29:42 - Phil Spencer Speaks!
00:33:36 - “Do you see Xbox coming out guns blazing at whatever event they'll hold in February revealing the console or at E3?” - The Nano Biologist
00:38:44 - Anthem Overhaul?
00:42:07 - Star Wars Review Round-Up
00:46:39 - “Do you believe the very positive reception for Jedi Fallen Order is an affirmation of critical and consumer desire for single player Star Wars titles?” - Eamon_in_DC
00:51:03 - “Do you think that it will be in the running for the Game Awards Game of the Year or did it possibly come out too late to be considered?” - Vince
00:53:18 - “I don't want to shit on this game or diminish its accomplishments…” - Constantine
00:58:00 - Star Wars in Fortnite
01:00:59 -  Brooklinen
01:02:15 - Manscaped
01:03:42 - Escape the Invasion
01:04:57 - Out today
01:06:09 - Squad Up: Bob - Mobile/Marvel Puzzle Quest - BuGambit
01:07:03 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Greg and That Nerdy Site’s Trevor Starkey
TUESDAY: Greg and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Whitta
THURSDAY: Greg and Imran
FRIDAY: Imran and Fran
